#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	const string a[]={"January","February","March","April","May","June","July","August","September","October","November","December"};
	string st;
	int d,y,idx;
	cin>>d;
	cin>>st;
	cin>>y;
	for(int i=0;i<12;i++){
		if(st.compare(a[i])==0)
		{
			idx=i;
			
			break;
		}
	}
	int x=(d)*(idx+1)+y;

	int s=x%9;
    while(s==0)
    {
    	s += 9;
    }
  	cout<<s;
	return 0;
}
